name: mini-kinetics-200
description: This **subset** of [Kinetics dataset](https://deepmind.com/research/open-source/open-source-datasets/kinetics/) consists of the 200 categories with most training examples; for each category, we randomly sample 400 examples from the training set, and 25 examples from the validation set, resulting in 80K training examples and 5K validation examples in total.
author: JevanChan
